Package Controller

Class PatientController

java.lang.Object
Controller.PatientController
public class PatientController extends Object
The PatientController class provides functionality for managing patient-related operations, such as authentication, updating contact information, displaying personal information, viewing medical records, and retrieving appointment outcomes.

This class acts as a bridge between patient-related views and the repository layer, handling the business logic and data operations for patient management.

Since:
2024-11-17

    • authenticate

      public static boolean authenticate(String id, String password)
      Authenticates a patient based on their ID and password.
      Parameters:
      id - The patient's ID.
      password - The patient's password.
      Returns:
      true if the credentials are valid; false otherwise.

    • changePassword

      public static boolean changePassword(Patient patient, String password, String confirmPassword)
      Changes the password of the specified patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient whose password is being updated.
      password - The new password.
      confirmPassword - The confirmation of the new password.
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully changed; false otherwise.
